DLG SPR_1

DLG SPR_0

DLG SPR_2
Nothing's on.

DLG SPR_3
The front door.

DLG SPR_4

DLG SPR_5
I've spent a lot of time cosy on here.

DLG SPR_6
The channel is dead

DLG SPR_7
Keeps the cold out.

DLG SPR_8
Hiss

DLG SPR_9
Old chair.

DLG SPR_a

DLG SPR_b
It's locked.

DLG SPR_c
Maybe I should just curl up here...

DLG SPR_d
No help at all.

DLG SPR_e

DLG SPR_f

VAR a
